body.name: Healsmart Toaster Oven with 20Litres Capacity,Compact Size Countertop Toaster, Easy to Control with Timer-Bake-Broil-Toast Setting, 1200W, Stainless Steel,16x11in,Black,Extra Large
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 7 hrs 3 mins
features: Compact Size:This toaster oven is compact. It doesn't take up much counter space. Makes a good gift to start off your new apartment. It's not heavy. Fits perfectly into small places heats up quick and very easy to use.Perfect size for the counter and easy to use.Matches coffee pot and trailer decor perfect.

3 Functions in 1 :This toaster oven is perfect for bake, broil, ,a toast, and all viewable through an adorable functional window/door.It is also great for reheating, small pizzas, cauliflower wings etc

Built in Timer :The toaster oven cooks fast so make sure you watch whatever you put in there. Very convenient for hearing things up quickly and not digital so you just turn the the knobs.It has the good *ding* timer to let you know whatever you threw in is done doing its thing.

Versatile&Quality Material: Heavy duty professional grade but can be cut to size easily with household scissors; easily tolerates temperatures up to about 500 degrees; can be used as an oven or pan liner, baking/cooking sheet or mat.
Easy to Clean :This toaster oven has more power and is easy to clean, the outside is also easy to clean too.
body.description: The product covered by this report is a Toaster Ovens for household and indoor use only, provided with a non-detachable flexible power supply cord terminated in a 2-wire polarized plug.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well worth it
reviews.reviewText: With this toaster oven, you get a low watt, well- constructed cooker that can fit two small trays and a heat flow option for from both top and bottom. That's a game changer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Overall I'm happy
reviews.reviewText: The quality seems good. It is lightweight, average in toasting, bakes well for such a small oven. I like the size and the controls seem to be sturdy and not likely to break. The downside is that one time it started to burn things and run very hot I unplugged it and it seemed to reset, so far so good. The other detail that is bothersome is that the temperature control has very small printing and odd temperatures for people in the US. I can easily work around this because I'm an experienced cook but it might throw someone else off. Another thing is that it comes with no crumb tray. Luckily I had one from another toaster oven. It's a little too small but does the job. I would say it's a very good value for a countertop oven and it's a good size you could probably fit a small whole chicken in there. I can cook a variety of foods with one appliance and that is important to me because I'm in a very small studio apartment and I only have one portable induction burner. Safe to say this is a handy appliance for me. I use it nearly every day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love my new toaster oven. I will be using it in my minivan/campervan. I use a toaster oven on a regular basis to cook dinner as I am a single person, so there's no need to turn on a big oven in the house. It has a lower wattage draw than my other one but that's what I was need because it will be running off a solar powered generator.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing toaster oven plus
reviews.reviewText: Makes toast , cakes, roasts meat and with two options for racks...males more than one thing at a time. Does not make the kitchen hot!!💛💛💛💛

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars possibly adequate for occasional use
reviews.reviewText: I got the small (9L) toaster oven. The reasons I give it three stars instead of 1 or 2 are because it's the exact size I wanted for my available counter space (4 slices is a pathetic lie, yet almost par for the course), it has a nice looking all black finish, it provides simple control (less chance for breaking) yet it does all I require, and it looks like it may hold up indefinitely - for all that's bad, it appears sturdy. Although acceptable to me, what's wrong with it is legion: it's near impossible to get a center spot where cooking or toasting is even close to being even - but in looking at similar ovens with one heating bar above and one below, they must suffer near identical issues. So your food is going to be cooked or toasted irregularly, and sometimes really screwed up depending on multiple factors. Yet I'm mostly ok with it since I know what I'm getting.The timer cannot be stopped (don't try) as the knob will only turn one way (time can be extended though) so when you want to stop early, you have to turn the heat off and let the timer run out. The heat control has a big F for Fahrenheit which is kind of weird, and the icon for the timer is alien symbol to me. It's made in China and sold here as 1500 watt but the manual says rated power is 1000 watt. It deserves no stars for that alone.Maybe I'll come back and provide the correct dimensions which took quite an effort to locate before I bought it.The manual/pamphlet is worthless and they tossed in random electrical warning discussion about a 5 amp fuse when it has no fuse. There is no pretense of any kind of warranty. The knobs are weakly marked to indicate which end is the pointer. I added white paint dots.There is one thing that could be of value in achieving more even cooking (although I haven't tried yet because I use it infrequently): preheat for a least a few minutes. I put an oven thermometer in it once and much more than half the time was spent warming up to the target temp.It does look good and it's easy to clean despite not having a crumb tray.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don't buy this toaster oven.
reviews.reviewText: The temperature setting is absolutely useless! If you like charcoal, then you've found your charcoal maker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good choice for small powder coating projects
reviews.reviewText: Bought this oven to cure powder coating. Does the job and is capable of 500Deg F per an independent temp gauge used to verify.Arrived in mostly good shape except the top of the outer metal cover had a 2” diameter dent. Would have given 5 stars if it had not been for the dent. Did not affect operation, but don’t know how it got it. The packaging did not have any damage.
